metadata.title: RA Family: SPI and QSPI compatibility

sections.content:
Question:
Are SPI and QSPI pin-compatible?
Answer:
Most flash chips these days have a pin layout that lets the user decide to either use it as normal SPI or Quad SPI.
Suitable Products
RA
